[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@boba-cli/dsl](./dsl.md) &gt; [FilepickerBuilderOptions](./dsl.filepickerbuilderoptions.md)

## FilepickerBuilderOptions interface

Options for the filepicker component builder.

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface FilepickerBuilderOptions 
```

## Remarks

Configure the file picker's behavior, appearance, and file system access. The filesystem and path adapters are required to interact with the file system.
